Nightlight::

Nightlight smiled happy when she saw that Aerotaur was ok. She took 
Trinity in arms and said "You see... He's ok, all is ok... "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He follows Windlord and Perplex into the chamber with 
Nightlight, 
> Trinity, and Angel Prime.  "Hello Angel Prime.  It's good to see 
you again."  
> He stretches a bit and reaches up to touch the back of his head.  
It was 
> still a little tender and he winced at the touch.  "See Trinity no 
little 
> shot to the head is going to keep me down for long."  He grins down 
at her 
> warmly.
